products.name: D-H/S Ions
products.desc: D-H/S IONS. The Latest Exclusive Multipurpose Disinfectant, hydrogen peroxide (50 %) & silver ions. D-H/S IONS. long acting broad spectrum against spores, fungi’s, bacteria, viruses, algae, bio film. D-H/S IONS. food grade, nontoxic, non-carcinogenic, non-mutagenic.

products.name: D-Q/A Cloud

products.label: ECO-FRIENDLY

products.name: PD-O

products.name: SSR
products.desc: SSR. a strong mixture of chemical cleaning solvents, emulsifier, surfactant and mixture of removers with disinfectant power to be able to remove any oil spots, organic spots and stains. It is not corrosive material so can work at any surface.

products.name: SMC
products.desc: SMC. a strong several complex substances antirust, corrosion inhibitor which stabilized for shiny metals.

products.name: Hand Soap
products.desc: A ready to use hand soap for cleaning and moisturizing. effective cleaning & get rid of germs. Preserves from infection and contagion.

products.desc: A ready to use hand soap for cleaning, sanitation and moisturizing. effective cleaner & sanitizer against all kinds of microbes, fungi’s, bacteria, viruses. Preserves from infection and contagion.

products.name: Hand Sanitizer (Gel)
